articles.description: Arush's maternal uncle Rahul Shinde said the authorities at Ahmednagar's Siddhi Vinayak hospital referred them to Jehangir hospital when the child did not show signs of improvement.
articles.content: Several doctors have seen a spike in dengue fever in children this monsoon. Dr Sagar Lad, paediatric intensivist at Pune’s Jehangir hospital, said the situation is slightly more challenging as most o… [+3463 chars]
